techmeme.title: OpenAI unveils GPT-4o mini, calling it "the most capable and cost-efficient small model available", and plans to integrate image, video, and audio into it later (Hayden Field/CNBC)
New York-based Coast, which offers expense management tools for vehicle fleets, raised a $40M Series B, after raising $25M in March 2024 and $27.5M in 2022 (Mary Ann Azevedo/TechCrunch)
Nintendo unveils an official Joy-Con charging stand for the Switch, over seven years after the console's launch, available on October 17, but gives no price (Ryan Dinsdale/IGN)
Sources: Meta has explored a multibillion-euro investment in eyewear group EssilorLuxottica, which makes the Ray Ban-Meta glasses, to expand its partnership (Financial Times)
How Spain relies on the VioGén algorithm to score the likelihood of recurring domestic violence and decide protection measures, with at times fatal consequences (New York Times)
